name: 2022 5th International Conference on Software Engineering and Information Management
content: Proceedings： Accepted and registered paper will be published in the ACM International Conference Proceedings, ISBN:978-1-4503-9551-9\. Indexing： ICSIM 2022 proceedings will be submitted for indexing in Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. The first 4 years' conference proceedings has been indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus successfully after the conference.
